snippet: Given the abuse found recently, New York State needs to conduct a full review of the preschool special education program and create an effective oversight system.
abstract: Editorial deplores news that fraud by private companies providing services to New York State's preschool special education program may be larger in scope than previously thought; calls on the state legislature to conduct a full review of the troubled program and create an effective oversight system.
lead_paragraph: Given the abuse found recently, New York State needs to conduct a full review of the preschool special education program and create an effective oversight system.
